  • Constructor Details

    • ItemSlot

      public ItemSlot()
      makes an instance of an item slot with default values

    • ItemSlot

      public ItemSlot(String itemName, int itemPrice, int itemCal, int itemAmt)
      makes an instance of an item slot with custom attributes
      Parameters:
      itemName - the name of the item in the item slot
      itemPrice - how much the item costs
      itemCal - the amount of calories in an item
      itemAmt - the starting number of the item inside the slot

    • ItemSlot
